body.name: LivTee Smart RGB LED Interior Lights, 2 Lines Design with USB Port, App Control, Music Mode and DIY Mode, Car Accessories Gifts for Women Men
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 2 hrs 23 mins
features: DIY Mode: Choose from 16 million available colors or customize car led light effects to your liking in DIY mode via Smart App. Make your car stand out in unique style with creative freedom.

Music Mode: Built-in mic helps interior car lights sync with any music type, manage the colors and brightness of car lights. Liven up your road trips, weekend getaways or evening commute with colors that dance vibrantly to your favorite songs.
2 Lines Design: 2 lines design connect the 4 strip lights, attaching the inside car lights easily to any car model without worrying about exposed wiring or an untidy look.

Safe USB Port: Power by USB port, which is more safe and lower heat than the cigarette port adapter. The led strip lights can be widely used in car, home, KTV, party decoration. Car LED light strip has a working voltage of 12V and the USB port is inconspicuous.

Perfect Gift: 4 Pcs 48 Led Car Interior Lights are colorful gifts for your friends and familly in holiday season, especially in christams. Theses strip lights are fun accessories for women, men and teens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LivTee Underglow Kit
reviews.reviewText: I've had this kit installed on my car for a few months now and it's fair to say that it's working very well. Getting the installation right is the most tedious part, eventually I went with hot glue and zip ties through drilled holes. After getting the lights mounted and the wires in a safe secure orientation, it's time to find power for the lights. I went with a 12v switch that goes to the interior for activation, that's spliced to the battery of the vehicle directly via the terminals- just red and black. The lights are very bright and for sure call attention, especially with the rainbow animation! way better than fading or solid colors you see with the cheaper kits in my opinion. Before hot gluing and drilling holes for zip ties, I had just relied on the double-sided tape included on the lights but after it shifted from warm to cold where I live they began drooping and eventually, I had a wire snag and kill the lights. I still had them affixed to the vehicle so it was just a matter of resplicing the cables together and sealing things up but it goes to show the importance of securing the lights and the cables- go overkill!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes the interior look cool at night
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install didn’t need to screw anything in. Able to hide the wires. The app easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: There weren't any instructions on how to install the lights other than the app that it uses on your phone. Works well at night and not so much during the day. There is a lot of wire so be prepared to tie some of it up. All in All, a decent product for 15 dollars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I do not usually leave reviews ever but I just HAD TO cause this is actually sad and disappointing… I was SO EXCITED TO ORDER THIS PRODUCT but when it arrived, the box was partially opened just a little bit (I doubt anyone opened it though…I have a feeling it just wasn’t closed all the way). THERE WERE NO INSTRUCTIONS… just two papers about the mobile app so this was definitely confusing to set up… the adhesive strips that come with this product barely even stick fr 🫤 and to make it worse one of the cords just ripped off the light so I currently have 3 lights in my car instead of 4… my sister and I were sooo confused because we couldn’t understand how it just ripped off so then I told her to get me scissors to see if I’m trippin… there’s NOO way something can be that flimsy!! I told my sister that if my scissors can just rip it then I know I wasn’t trippin… I kid you not my scissors just slide through it like I was ripping up some flimsy paper… I only did this cause I just already knew this was a L that I had to take though. I’m highly disappointed cause I just expected more… idk what exactly I expected fr but this just definitely wasn’t what I expected!! I won’t tell y’all not to buy cause I ain’t no hater but I definitely had to share my experience with this product cause… I’m just at a lost for words atp… God Bless y’all though 🥰

After i exited out of it then i could not ever connect again this was the biggest waste of money I would not reccomend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cute lights easy to set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very nice addition to my car but missing alternate control
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. So they look nice and seems to have a strong double sided 3m tape, however my big issue is that the only way to control the lights is through an app. Other lights have control on either the lights itself (a small rectangular box that the lights are attached too) or/and they include a remote, either priced the same or for a few bucks more. For this reason I recommend buying different interior led lights.My complaint may not seem like a big deal but sometimes the light are unresponsive for a min when I am trying to control it by simply changing colors through the app. I'll rate this a 3 for the lack of control and If I didn't already install it, I would have returned it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the price they are REALLY GOOD i give it a 10/10 in my opinion. I installed it in my dads 1995 Toyota 4Runner and they run smoothly. They are actually really bright, i will be buying another set for my moms truck now hahaha
